shortDescriptionForSaas: Made for ambitious developers to ship multi-tenant applications in minutes...not days.

authenticationDescription: Secure and Easy-to-Use Authentication for Your Launch Ready Apps SaaS Website and API
authenticationDetail: Our authentication system is built on top of the industry-leading PaaS such as Supabase and Firebase. It is secure, easy-to-use, and fully customizable. It supports email/password, social logins, and more.

dashboardDescription: A fantastic dashboard to manage your Launch Ready Apps SaaS business
dashboardDetail: Our dashboard offers an overview of your Launch Ready Apps SaaS business. It shows at a glance all you need to know about your business. It is fully customizable and extendable.
cancelAnytime: Get started for free. No credit card required. Cancel anytime.
readyToTakeSaasBusiness: Ready to take your Launch Ready Apps SaaS business to the next level?
upgradeWhenYouAreReady: Get started on our free plan and upgrade when you are ready.
